mapper.select: SELECT c.titl as ctitl, cq.titl, cq.rgdt FROM p_cls_qna cq JOIN p_cls c ON cq.cno = c.cno JOIN p_mete m ON cq.meno = m.meno WHERE m.meno = #{no} order by qno desc;

SELECT c.titl ctitl, cq.titl, cq.conts, cq.rgdt, cq.anser, cq.rgdt2, me2.name as me2name, me2.nick as me2nick
FROM p_cls_qna cq JOIN p_cls c ON cq.cno = c.cno JOIN p_meto mo ON c.mono = mo.mono JOIN p_mete me2 ON cq.meno = me2.meno WHERE mo.mono = #{no} order by qno desc;

select * from ( select @rownum:=@rownum+1 as rnum, ps.cno, psa.qno, psa.type, psa.titl, psa.conts, pme.nick, psa.rgdt, psa.anser from p_cls_qna as psa inner join p_cls as ps on psa.cno = ps.cno inner join p_mete as pme on psa.meno = pme.meno ,(select @rownum:=0)r where ps.cno = #{no} order by psa.qno desc ) as a where rnum limit #{qnapageNo},#{qnapageSize};
select count(*) from p_cls_qna as psa inner join p_cls as ps on psa.cno = ps.cno inner join p_mete as pme on psa.meno = pme.meno where ps.cno = #{no} order by psa.qno desc;
mapper.update: update p_cls_qna set anser = #{anser}, rgdt2 = now() where qno = #{no}
